attributes.action: INCREASE THE SCHOOL CLOTHING GRANT FORM £50 PER CHILD TO £100 PER CHIL
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: CAN ANYBODY ACCTUALLY KIT THEIR CHILD OUT FOR SCHOOL ON £50? I THINK THEY SHOULD DOUBLE THE AMOUNT OF A SCHOOL CLOTHING GRANT!!!

rejection.details: Please rewrite in upper and lower case.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
